DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Gene phylogenies based on Bayesian analysis
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Phylogenetic analyses of genes of interest (EPR, HB, NFP, HCT, EPR, NIN, and RPG). Amino acid sequence alignments were generated using MAFFT version 7.017. Analyses were performed using MrBayes version 3.2.6 running 2.2 million generations, setting gamma-distributed rate variation and integrating over different models of amino acid sequence evolution (aamodelpr=mixed). For NFP analyses were based on the full-length sequences as well as separately on the kinase domain only.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Comparative genomics
copy number variation
evolution
nitrogen fixation
symbiosis
